attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Urge this government to (a) continue to accept and treat Hamas as the terrorist organisation that it is and (b) stand by Israel as an ally, a democratic and sovereign state and (c) not give way to terrorism.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
